rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming foyer with Scandinavian minimalism and natural light.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area with modern furniture and a minimalist decor reflecting Scandinavian design principles.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Functional dining space adjacent to the kitchen for family meals.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Efficient and modern Scandinavian kitchen with open-plan design to connect with dining area.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Storage for cleaning supplies, small appliances, and recycling.

rooms.name: Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Master bedroom with ample space and a private balcony. Designed in accordance with Vastu principles by placing the bed along the eastern wall to promote positive energy.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Second bedroom with a spacious balcony. Orientation is optimized for morning light and Vastu compliant placement.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Third bedroom with a private balcony, ensuring privacy and natural ventilation.

openings.description: Large, Scandinavian style door allowing ample light and connection to the outdoors.
Large window that provides natural light in accordance with minimalistic design.
Door leading to the private balcony for Bedroom 1.
Door leading to the private balcony for Bedroom 2.
Door leading to the private balcony for Bedroom 3.
Elegant staircase connecting ground floor with upper levels, designed with Scandinavian minimalism and safety in mind.
